content: --कृत्या, अपात्रीकरणं doing degrading or unworthy acts; disqualification, any action which makes a man unworthy; four disqualifications for a Brāhmaṇa are mentioned in <ls>Ms. 11. 70</ls>: -निंदितेभ्यो धनादानं वाणिज्यं शूद्रसेवनं . अपात्रीकरणं ज्ञेयमसत्यस्य च भाषणम् ..; see also <ls n="Ms.">11. 126.</ls>
